Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
ModelConstructor Interface implemented by classes that construct models.
ModelConstructor.Maker Interface implemented by objects that make instances of this kind of SubModelFactory.
SubModelConstructor  
SubModelConstructor.Maker Interface implemented by clasess that make instances that implement the SubModelFactory interface.
 

Class Summary
Block A class that implements a Block submodel that generates ungapped alignments of conserved noncoding sequences with a negative binomial length distribution.
CommonDistributionFactory This distribution is intended for use as a transition Distribution for a State in a MarkovModel.
DOM2SAXConverter A minimal class that traverses a part of a DOM tree and generates SAX events from it to allow it to be handled by a SAX ContentHandler.
DualHeadStatePathTool Support class for analysing and printing StatePaths
EnhSearch Implements an HMM with one Block submodel and two Spacer submodels, one for constrained (Type1) spacers and another for unconstrained (Type2) spacers.
GappedPairDistribution This class implements PairDistributions in which one Distribution emits gaps only.
MakeBlock This class creates an instance of the Block submodel described by the parameters supplied on the command line and then writes out an XML representation of the object to STDOUT.
MakeEnhSearch This class makes an instance of of the full EnhSearch model from XML definitions of each of its constituent submodels.
MakeType1spacer This class creates an instance of the Type 1 Spacer submodel described by the parameters supplied on the command line and then writes out an XML representation of the object to STDOUT.
MakeType2spacer This class creates an instance of the Type 2 Spacer submodel described by the parameters supplied on the command line and then writes out an XML representation of the object to STDOUT.
ModelConstructorFactory  
ModelRunner Class that finds optimal state path through a pair of sequences under an EnhSearch model using the Viterbi algorithm

Use as follows:-
StatePathOutput  
Stopper  
SubModelConstructorFactory  
TrainBlock This class is used to train Block objects using the Viterbi algorithm that were previously created and parameterised by MakeBlock.
TrainType1spacer This class is used to train Type1spacer objects using the Viterbi algorithm that were previously created and parameterised by MakeType1spacer.
TrainType2spacer This class is used to train Type2spacer objects using the Viterbi algorithm that were previously created and parameterised by MakeType2spacer.
Type1spacer A class that implements a multi-staged HMM that emits two sequences of different length as a block of (mis)matched nucleotides followed by successive gaps in the shorter sequence.
Type2spacer A class that implements a multi-staged HMM that emits two sequences of different length as a block of (mis)matched nucleotides followed by successive gaps in the shorter sequence.
XMLDistTools
